:::config { "language": "nginx", "theme": "night-owl" }
server {
    location / {
        proxy_pass http://localhost:8080/;
    }

    location ~ \.(gif|jpg|png)$ {
        root /data/images;
    }
}
:::expectation
<pre class='phiki language-nginx night-owl' style='background-color: #011627;color: #d6deeb;'><code data-theme='night-owl' data-lang='nginx' class='torchlight' style='--theme-selection-background: #4373c2'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #4b6479; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #c792ea;">server</span><span class="token" style="color: #d6deeb;"> {
